TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BackgroundType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the source of a visual style element's background.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The background of a visual style element can be a bitmap image, a filled rectangle, or nothing. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BackgroundType> values represent the return values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer.GetEnumValue%2A> method when it is called with an argument value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BackgroundType BorderFill = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The background of the element is a rectangle filled with a color or pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BackgroundType ImageFile = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The background of the element is a bitmap. If this value is set, then the property corresponding to the value will contain the name of a valid image file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.BackgroundType None = int32(2)
